title: Ron Paul on secession
author: VD
content_html: If a state does not have a right to secede, then the U.S.A. is nothing but another empire based on nothing but military force. And, like all empires based on military force, it will collapse as soon as it can’t pay its forces to maintain the occupation.
content_text: If a state does not have a right to secede, then the U.S.A. is nothing but another empire based on nothing but military force.  And, like all empires based on military force, it will collapse as soon as it can’t pay its forces to maintain the occupation.
